widget.name: Row based Help Text Plus Viewer
widget.description: Displays a help text in a form row. Might be toggled by the Help Text Trigger. If hidden, the whole row will be hidden.

property.caption: Help text
property.description: The help text which will be displayed when the user trigger the viewer

property.caption: Start Visible
property.description: If true, the row will start visible. If false, the help text will be visible once the Help Texts are triggered.

property.caption: Hide on click
property.description: If true, the row will fade away when clicked (Clicking the Help Text Trigger will restore the help text after hiding).

property.caption: Height
property.description: Maximum height of the help box in pixels
